variable.name: WTMAX2Y_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, what was your highest weight?

variable.name: WTMIN2Y_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, what was your lowest weight?

variable.name: LOST5LBP_3
variable.description: Lose 5 or more pounds on purpose
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, did you lose five or more pounds on purpose at any time?

variable.name: LWPDIET_3
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight? (Mark all that apply.) Change in diet Sub-question of F143 V3 Q3 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWPEXER_3
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight? (Mark all that apply.) Increased exercise Sub-question of F143 V3 Q3 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWPREDUX_3
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight? (Mark all that apply.) Redux diet pill (dexfenfluramine) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q3 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWPOTHPL_3
variable.description: Other diet pill to lose weight
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight? (Mark all that apply.) Other diet pill Sub-question of F143 V3 Q3 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWPCMPRG_3
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight? (Mark all that apply.) Commercial weight loss program Sub-question of F143 V3 Q3 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWPSMKNG_3
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight? (Mark all that apply.) Started or increased smoking Sub-question of F143 V3 Q3 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWPSRGRY_3
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight? (Mark all that apply.) Surgical procedure (such as intestinal bypass or stomach balloon) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q3 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LWPOTHER_3
variable.comment: What method(s) did you use to lose weight? (Mark all that apply.) Other (Specify): Sub-question of F143 V3 Q3 'Lost 5 pounds on purpose'.

variable.name: LOST5LBA_3
variable.description: Lose five or more pounds not on purpose
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, did you lose five or more pounds not on purpose at any time?

variable.name: LWAILLNS_3
variable.comment: What was the cause of this weight loss? (Mark all that apply.) Illness Sub-question of F143 V3 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds not on purpose'.

variable.name: LWADEPRS_3
variable.comment: What was the cause of this weight loss? (Mark all that apply.) Depression Sub-question of F143 V3 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds not on purpose'.

variable.name: LWASTRES_3
variable.comment: What was the cause of this weight loss? (Mark all that apply.) Stressful time Sub-question of F143 V3 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds not on purpose'.

variable.name: LWALEVNT_3
variable.description: Lost weight due to life events
variable.comment: What was the cause of this weight loss? (Mark all that apply.) Life events Sub-question of F143 V3 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds not on purpose'.

variable.name: LWALSAPP_3
variable.description: Lost weight due to loss of appetite
variable.comment: What was the cause of this weight loss? (Mark all that apply.) Loss of appetite Sub-question of F143 V3 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds not on purpose'.

variable.name: LWAOTHER_3
variable.description: Lost weight due to other reason
variable.comment: What was the cause of this weight loss? (Mark all that apply.) Other (Specify): Sub-question of F143 V3 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds not on purpose'.

variable.name: LWADNTNO_3
variable.description: Don't know reason for losing weight
variable.comment: What was the cause of this weight loss? (Mark all that apply.) Don't know Sub-question of F143 V3 Q4 'Lost 5 pounds not on purpose'.

variable.name: FGTHINK_3
variable.description: Figure that reflects how you think you look
variable.comment: Choose the figure that: reflects how you think you look

variable.name: FGFEEL_3
variable.description: Figure that reflects how you feel
variable.comment: Choose the figure that: reflects how you feel most of the time.

variable.name: FGIDLYOU_3
variable.description: Figure that is the ideal for you
variable.comment: Choose the figure that: is your ideal figure (for you).

variable.name: FGIDLWOM_3
variable.description: Figure you think is Ideal for women
variable.comment: Choose the figure that: you think is ideal for women.

variable.name: FGPRFMEN_3
variable.description: Figure you think is preferred by men
variable.comment: Choose the figure that: you think is most preferred by men.

variable.name: FGPRFWOM_3
variable.description: Figure you think is preferred by women
variable.comment: Choose the figure that you think is most preferred by women.

variable.name: WALKSWK_3
variable.description: How often walk outside the home for > 10 min
variable.comment: Think about the walking you do outside the home. How often do you walk outside the home for more than 10 minutes without stopping? (Mark only one.)

variable.name: MINSWALK_3
variable.description: How many minutes walk outside the home for > 10 min
variable.comment: When you walk outside the home for more than 10 minutes without stopping, for how many minutes do you usually walk? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q6 'Walk more than 10 minutes'.

variable.name: WALKSPD_3
variable.comment: What is your usual speed? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q6 'Walk more than 10 minutes'.

variable.name: HDEXFREQ_3
variable.comment: STRENUOUS OR VERY HARD EXERCISE (You work up a sweat and your heart beats fast). For example, aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swimming laps.

variable.name: HARDMINS_3
variable.description: Duration per session of strenuous exercise
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q7.1 'Strenuous exercise'.

variable.name: MDEXFREQ_3
variable.comment: MODERATE EXERCISE (Not exhausting). For example, biking outdoors, use of an exercise machine (like a stationary bike or treadmill), calisthenics, easy swimming, popular and folk dancing.

variable.name: MODMINS_3
variable.description: Duration per session of moderate exercise
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q7.3 'Moderate exercise'.

variable.name: MLEXFREQ_3
variable.comment: MILD EXERCISE. For example, slow dancing, bowling, golf.

variable.name: MILDMINS_3
variable.description: Duration per session of mild exercise
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q7.5 'Mild exercise'.

variable.name: INDRCHOR_3
variable.comment: About how many hours each week do you usually spend doing heavy (strenuous) indoor household chores such as scrubbing floors, sweeping, or vacuuming?

variable.name: YRDWORKM_3
variable.comment: About how many months during the year do you usually do things in the yard, such as mowing, raking, gardening, or shoveling snow?

variable.name: YRDWRKH_3
variable.description: Hours each week doing yard work
variable.comment: When you do these things in the yard, how many hours each week do you do them? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q9 'Months of yardwork'.

variable.name: SITTING_3
variable.comment: During a usual day and night, about how many hours do you spend sitting? Be sure to include the time you spend sitting at work, sitting at the table eating, driving or riding in a car or bus, and sitting up watching TV or talking.

variable.name: SLEEPING_3
variable.comment: During a usual day and night, about how many hours do you spend sleeping or lying down? Be sure to include the time you spend sleeping or trying to sleep at night, resting or napping, and lying down watching TV.

variable.name: HDACT5_3
variable.comment: 5-9 years old?

variable.name: HDACT10_3
variable.comment: 10-14 years old?

variable.name: HDACT15_3
variable.comment: 15-19 years old?

variable.name: HDACT20_3
variable.comment: 20-29 years old?

variable.name: CFINSTNT_3
variable.description: Past 3 months frequency drank regular instant coffee
variable.comment: Regular instant (not decaf) coffee (cups)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: CFLATTE_3
variable.description: Past 3 months frequency drank espresso or latte
variable.comment: Regular (not decaf) espresso or latte (cups)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: CFOTHDRP_3
variable.description: Past 3 months frequency drank drip coffee
variable.comment: Other regular drip coffee (not decaf) - drip, coffee maker, etc. (cups)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: CFDECAF_3
variable.description: Past 3 months frequency drank decaf coffee
variable.comment: Decaf coffee - any type (cups)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: CFREGTEA_3
variable.comment: Regular tea (not herbal, not decaf) (cups)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: CFHRBTEA_3
variable.description: Past 3 months frequency drank herbal tea
variable.comment: Herbal tea (cups)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: CFDCFTEA_3
variable.description: Past 3 months frequency drank decaf tea
variable.comment: Decaf tea (cups)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: TAPWATER_3
variable.description: Past 3 months frequency drank tap water
variable.comment: Water from the tap (8 ounce glasses)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: BOTLDWTR_3
variable.description: Past 3 months frequency drank bottled water
variable.comment: Bottled water, carbonated or plain (8 ounce glasses)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: DIETDRNK_3
variable.description: Past 3 months frequency drank diet drinks
variable.comment: Diet drinks, such as Diet Coke or diet fruit drinks (12 ounce cans)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: ALC3MO_3
variable.comment: During the past 3 months, have you had any drinks containing alcohol? Backcoded from sub-questions.

variable.name: ALCOFTEN_3
variable.comment: In the past 3 months, how often have you had drinks containing alcohol? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q18 'Alcohol in past 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied). Question 18 recoded to yes if any of q18.1-q18.3 is marked.
variable.value: One day per month or less
Every day or about every day

variable.name: DRNKSDAY_3
variable.description: Past 3 months drinks of alcohol per day
variable.comment: In the past 3 months, on the days you drank, how many drinks did you usually have per day? (A drink is a 12 ounce glass of beer, one 4 ounce glass of wine, or one shot [1 1/4 oz.] of liquor) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q18 'Alcohol in past 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: NOMLDRNK_3
variable.description: Past 3 months drinks of alcohol not around major meal
variable.comment: In the past 3 months, on the days you drank, how many of those drinks did you usually drink that were not around a major meal (not around lunch, not around dinner)? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q18 'Alcohol in past 3 months'(skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: SPECOCCS_3
variable.description: Drink alcohol more than usual on special occasions
variable.comment: Do you drink more than usual for special occasions? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q18 'Alcohol in past 3 months' (skip pattern rule applied to recoded question 18 - 'Alcohol last 3 months').

variable.name: SPCOCOFT_3
variable.description: How often drink more alcohol on special occasions
variable.comment:
How often does this happen? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q18 'Alcohol in past 3 months'
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q18.4 'Drink more on special occasion' (skip pattern rule applied using recoded question 18 - 'Alcohol last 3 months').

variable.name: AHABCHNG_3
variable.comment: Since you enrolled in this study, have you changed your drinking habits?

variable.name: AHOWCHNG_3
variable.comment: How have you changed your alcohol drinking? Have you: Sub-question of F143 V3 Q19 'Changed drinking habits'.

variable.name: AWHYCHNG_3
variable.comment: Why did you make this change? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q19 'Changed drinking habits'.

variable.name: SMOKENW_3
variable.comment: Do you smoke cigarettes now?

variable.name: CIGSDAY_3
variable.comment: How many cigarettes do you usually smoke each day? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q20 'Smoke cigarettes now'.

variable.name: LIVSMK_3
variable.comment: Does anyone living with you now smoke cigarettes regularly inside your home?

variable.name: HSBNDSMK_3
variable.description: Husband or partner in home smokes
variable.comment: Please mark all the people who live with you who now smoke cigarettes regularly inside your home: Husband or partner Sub-question of F143 V3 Q21 'Living with inside smoker'.

variable.name: CHILDSMK_3
variable.description: Son or daughter in home smokes
variable.comment: Please mark all the people who live with you who now smoke cigarettes regularly inside your home: Son(s) or daughter(s) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q21 'Living with inside smoker'.

variable.name: OTHSMK_3
variable.comment: Please mark all the people who live with you who now smoke cigarettes regularly inside your home: Other person/people Sub-question of F143 V3 Q21 'Living with inside smoker'.

variable.name: SMKWORK_3
variable.description: Work in a space where people smoke
variable.comment: Do you now work in a space where people smoke cigarettes?

variable.name: NOTWRK_3
variable.comment: What is your current job status? Not Working

variable.name: RETIRED_3
variable.comment: What is your current job status? Retired

variable.name: HOMEMKR_3
variable.comment: What is your current job status? Homemaker, raising children, care of others

variable.name: EMPLOYED_3
variable.comment: What is your current job status? Employed (full-time or part-time)

variable.name: DISABLED_3
variable.comment: What is your current job status? Disabled, unable to work

variable.name: OTHWRK_3
variable.comment: What is your current job status?

variable.name: MARITAL_3
variable.comment: What is your current marital status? (Mark the one that best describes you.)

variable.name: PNOTWRK_3
variable.comment: What is your husband's (partner's) current job status? Not Working Sub-question of F143 V3 Q24 'Marital status'.

variable.name: PRETIRED_3
variable.comment: What is your husband's (partner's) current job status? Retired Sub-question of F143 V3 Q24 'Marital status'.

variable.name: PHOMEMKR_3
variable.comment: What is your husband's (partner's) current job status? Homemaker Sub-question of F143 V3 Q24 'Marital status'.

variable.name: PEMPLOY_3
variable.comment: What is your husband's (partner's) current job status? Employed Sub-question of F143 V3 Q24 'Marital status'.

variable.name: PDISABLE_3
variable.comment: What is your husband's (partner's) current job status? Disabled Sub-question of F143 V3 Q24 'Marital status'.

variable.name: POTHWRK_3
variable.comment: What is your husband's (partner's) current job status? Other Sub-question of F143 V3 Q24 'Marital status'.

variable.name: INCOME_3
variable.comment: What was the total family income (before taxes) from all sources within your household in the last year? (Mark the one that is the best guess)

variable.name: CAREPROV_3
variable.description: Have a usual medical care provider
variable.comment: Do you have a clinic, doctor, nurse or physician assistant who provides your usual medical care?

variable.name: LSTVIS_3
variable.description: When was last visit to health care provider
variable.comment: When did you last visit this clinic or person? (Please give your best guess.) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q26 'Has usual med care provider'.

variable.name: NEWDR3Y_3
variable.description: Has health care provider changed in past 3 years
variable.comment: Has your usual health care provider changed in the past 3 years? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q26 'Has usual med care provider'.

variable.name: HLTHINSR_3
variable.comment: Do you currently have health insurance? This includes pre-paid private insurance such as a Health Maintenance Organization (HMO), other private insurance, Medicare, Medicaid (including State Medical Assistance, Medi-Cal or DPA), Military or VA coverage.

variable.name: DRSCVRED_3
variable.description: Doctors, hospitals covered by current health insurance
variable.comment: Which of the following best describes the doctors and hospitals covered by your current health insurance? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q27 'Has health insurance now'.
variable.value: Benefits same for any doctor or hospital
Pay more for those not on a list
Must use only those on a list

variable.name: INSPREPD_3
variable.comment: Pre-paid private insurance, such as a Health Maintenance Organization (HMO), Kaiser Permanente or other Group Health-type plan? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q27 'Has health insurance now'.

variable.name: PPEMPPD_3
variable.comment:
Who pays for this insurance? (Mark all that apply.) Costs are paid by my employer or my spouse's employer Sub-question of F143 V3 Q27 'Has health insurance now'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q28.1 'Pre-paid private insurance'.

variable.name: PPMEPD_3
variable.comment:
Who pays for this insurance? (Mark all that apply.) Costs are paid by me Sub-question of F143 V3 Q27 'Has health insurance now'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q28.1 'Pre-paid private insurance'.

variable.name: PPMEDPD_3
variable.comment:
Who pays for this insurance? (Mark all that apply.) Medicare Sub-question of F143 V3 Q27 'Has health insurance now'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q28.1 'Pre-paid private insurance'.

variable.name: INSOTHPV_3
variable.comment: Other private insurance such as Blue Cross, Aetna, etc.? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q27 'Has health insurance now'.

variable.name: PRVEMPPD_3
variable.description: Employer pays for other private insurance
variable.comment:
Who pays for this insurance? (Mark all that apply.) Costs are paid by my employer or my spouse's employer Sub-question of F143 V3 Q27 'Has health insurance now'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q28.3 'Other private insurance'.

variable.name: PRVMEPD_3
variable.description: I pay for other private insurance
variable.comment:
Who pays for this insurance? (Mark all that apply.) Costs are paid by me Sub-question of F143 V3 Q27 'Has health insurance now'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q28.3 'Other private insurance'.

variable.name: INSMEDCR_3
variable.comment: Medicare? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q27 'Has health insurance now'.

variable.name: MEDADDCV_3
variable.description: Have additional coverage to supplement Medicare
variable.comment:
Do you have additional coverage to supplement your Medicare benefits? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q27 'Has health insurance now'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q28.5 'Medicare'.

variable.name: INSMDCAD_3
variable.comment: Medicaid, including State Medical Assistance, Medi-Cal, or DPA? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q27 'Has health insurance now'.

variable.name: INSMLTRY_3
variable.description: Have Military or VA sponsored health insurance
variable.comment: Military or Veterans Administration-sponsored? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q27 'Has health insurance now'.

variable.name: INSOTHER_3
variable.comment: Other? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q27 'Has health insurance now'.

variable.name: NATHOR2_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, did you use any 'natural' hormones that you can get without a doctor's prescription? They may be in the form of a pill, vaginal cream or suppository, or skin cream.

variable.name: YAMCRM2_3
variable.description: Used wild yam or progesterone creams
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? Wild yam or progesterone creams Sub-question of F143 V3 Q29 'Natural hormones in past 2 yrs'.

variable.name: YAMPLS2_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? Wild yam pills Sub-question of F143 V3 Q29 'Natural hormones in past 2 yrs'.

variable.name: PRGSUP2_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? Progesterone suppositories Sub-question of F143 V3 Q29 'Natural hormones in past 2 yrs'.

variable.name: DHEAPL2_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? DHEA (dehydroepiandosterone) pills Sub-question of F143 V3 Q29 'Natural hormones in past 2 yrs'.

variable.name: PHYPLS2_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? Phytoestrogen pills (soy or flax) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q29 'Natural hormones in past 2 yrs'.

variable.name: PHYCRM2_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? Phystoestrogen creams (soy or flax) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q29 'Natural hormones in past 2 yrs'.

variable.name: PHYFDS2_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? Phytoestrogen containing foods (tofu, soybeans) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q29 'Natural hormones in past 2 yrs'.

variable.name: NTOTHR2_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? Used other natural hormones Sub-question of F143 V3 Q29 'Natural hormones in past 2 yrs'.

variable.name: NTDNTK2_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, what types of 'natural' hormones have you used? Don't know Sub-question of F143 V3 Q29 'Natural hormones in past 2 yrs'.

variable.name: HRPST2YR_3
variable.description: Past 2 years used prescribed female hormones
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, did you use female hormones (ESTROGEN or PROGESTERONE) that were prescibed by a doctor? (This may have been in the form of a pill, skin patch, shot, or vaginal cream or suppository.)

variable.name: EPPL_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, did you use female hormone PILLS prescibed by a doctor which contained both ESTROGEN and progestin (PROGESTERONE) COMBINED in the same pill or package (for example Prempro, Premphase)? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.

variable.name: EPDUR_3
variable.description: Used Estrogen and Progestin - how many months
variable.comment:
In the past 2 years, how many months did you use COMBINED female hormone PILLS which contained both ESTROGEN and PROGESTIN? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q31 'Combined estr/prog pills'.

variable.name: ETPL_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, did you use female hormone PILLS prescibed by a doctor which contained both ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE COMBINED in the same pill (for example, Estratest)? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.

variable.name: ETDUR_3
variable.description: Used Estrogen and Testosterone pills - how many months
variable.comment:
In the past 2 years, how many months did you use COMBINED female hormone pills which contained both ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q32 'Combined estr/testost pills'.

variable.name: ETTYPE_3
variable.description: Used Estrogen and Testosterone - what type
variable.comment:
In the past 2 years, what type of COMBINED ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE pill did you use the longest? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q32 'Combined estr/testost pills'.

variable.name: EPL_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, did you use ESTROGEN PILLS which were prescibed by a doctor (for example, Premarin, Estrace, Ogen)? (Do not include the combined pill of estrogen and progestin or the combined pill of estrogen and testosterone.) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.

variable.name: EPLDUR_3
variable.description: Used Estrogen pills - how many months
variable.comment:
In the past 2 years, how many months did you use ESTROGEN PILLS? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q33 'Used estrogen pills'.

variable.name: EPLDAYS_3
variable.description: Used Estrogen pills - average number of days
variable.comment:
In the past 2 years, when you were using ESTROGEN pills, what was the average number of days each month you used the pills? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q33 'Used estrogen pills'.

variable.name: EPLTYPE_3
variable.comment:
In the past 2 years, what type of ESTROGEN pill did you use the longest? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q33 'Used estrogen pills'.

variable.name: EPLDOSE_3
variable.comment:
What dose did you usually take each day? (Mark one. If you regularly take more than one dose, mark the lowest dose.) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q33 'Used estrogen pills'.

variable.name: ESHT_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, did you take shots containing the hormone ESTROGEN? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.

variable.name: ESHTDUR_3
variable.description: Used Estrogen shots - how many months
variable.comment:
In the past 2 years, how many months did you take the shots? (Count each shot as one month.) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q34 'Took estrogen shots'.

variable.name: ECRM_3
variable.description: Used Estrogen vaginal cream or suppository
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, did you use a vaginal cream or suppository containing ESTROGEN which was prescribed by a doctor? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.

variable.name: ECRMDUR_3
variable.description: Estrogen vaginal cream or suppository - how many months
variable.comment:
In the past 2 years, how many months did you use the vaginal cream or suppository? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q35 'Used estrogen in vaginal cream'.

variable.name: EPCH_3
variable.comment:
In the past 2 years, did you use a SKIN PATCH containing the hormone ESTROGEN with or without PROGESTERONE (for example, Estraderm, Climera, Vivelle)? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
On forms 146-148 this variable reflects non-combination estrogen use only.

variable.name: EPCHDUR_3
variable.description: Used Estrogen skin patch - how many months
variable.comment:
In the past 2 years, how many months did you use the patch? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q36 'Used estrogen skin patch'.

variable.name: EPCHTYPE_3
variable.description: Used Estrogen Skin patch - what type
variable.comment:
In the past 2 years, what type of patch did you use the longest? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q36 'Used estrogen skin patch'.

variable.name: EPCHDOSE_3
variable.comment:
What dose of ESTROGEN was in the skin patch you usually used? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q36 'Used estrogen skin patch'.

variable.name: EPCHCHNG_3
variable.description: Estrogen skin patch - times changed per week
variable.comment:
What was the average number of times each week that you changed your skin patch? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q36 'Used estrogen skin patch'.

variable.name: PPL_3
variable.comment: In the past 2 years, did you use the female hormone PILL called PROGESTERONE or progestin (for example, Provera, Cycrin, Amen, Megace)? (Do not include the combined pill of estrogen and progestin.) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.

variable.name: PPLDUR_3
variable.comment:
In the past 2 years, how many months did you use PROGESTERONE or PROGESTIN pills? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q37 'Used progesterone pills'.

variable.name: PPLDAY_3
variable.description: Used Progesterone - average number days per month
variable.comment:
In the past 2 years, when you were using PROGESTERONE or PROGESTIN pills, what was the average number of days each month you used the pills? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q37 'Used progesterone pills'.

variable.name: PPLTYPE_3
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of PROGESTERONE or PROGESTIN pill did you use the longest? Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q37 'Used progesterone pills'.

variable.name: PPLDOSE_3
variable.comment:
What dose did you usually take each day? (Mark one. If you regularly take more than one dose, mark the lowest dose.) Sub-question of F143 V3 Q30 'Used female hormones'.
Sub-question of F143 V3 Q37 'Used progesterone pills'.

variable.name: CATARACT_3
variable.comment: Cataract(s)

variable.name: MACDEGNR_3
variable.comment: Macular degeneration of the retina

variable.name: ASTHMA_3
variable.comment: Asthma

variable.name: EMPHYSEM_3
variable.comment: Emphysema or chronic bronchitis

variable.name: CHF_3
variable.comment: Heart failure or congestive heart failure

variable.name: ANGINA_3
variable.comment: Angina (chest pains from the heart)

variable.name: ATRIALFB_3
variable.comment: Atrial fibrillation

variable.name: KIDNEYST_3
variable.comment: Kidney or bladder stones (renal or urinary calculi)

variable.name: KIDDIALY_3
variable.comment: Dialysis for kidney or renal failure

variable.name: STOMULCR_3
variable.comment: Stomach or duodenal ulcer

variable.name: DIVERTIC_3
variable.comment: Diverticulitis

variable.name: PANCREAT_3
variable.comment: Pancreatitis (inflamed pancreas)

variable.name: LIVRDIS_3
variable.comment: Liver disease (chronic active hepatitis, cirrhosis, or yellow jaundice)

variable.name: OVRTHY_3
variable.comment: Overactive thyroid

variable.name: UNDTHY_3
variable.comment: Underactive thyroid

variable.name: ALZHEIM_3
variable.comment: Alzheimer's disease

variable.name: MS_3
variable.comment: Multiple sclerosis

variable.name: PARKINS_3
variable.comment: Parkinson's disease

variable.name: ALS_3
variable.comment: Amyotropic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS, motor neuron disease, or Lou Gehrig's disease)

variable.name: TEPIWK
variable.description: Episodes recreational phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 6, 7.1, 7.3, and 7.5. Total number of episodes per week of recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: LEPITOT
variable.description: Episodes recreational phys activity per week >= 20 Min
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 6, 6.1, 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5 and 7.6. Episodes per week of recreational physical activity of >=20 minutes duration (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: MSEPIWK
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 6.2, 7.1, and 7.3. Episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: XLMSEPI
variable.description: Episdoes moderate to strenuous activity >= 20 min/week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 6, 6.1, 6.2, 7.1, 7.2, 7.3 and 7.4. Episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity of >=20 minutes duration (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: LMSEPI
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 6, 6.1, 6.2, 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and 7.4. Categorical variable of episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity of >= 20 minutes duration (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity). Computed from XLMSEPI and TEPIWK.

variable.name: SEPIWK
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, question 7.1. Episodes per week of strenuous recreational physical activity.

variable.name: TMINWK
variable.description: Minutes of recreational phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 6, 6.1, 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5, and 7.6. Total minutes per week of recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: MSMINWK
variable.description: Minutes of moderate to strenuous activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 6, 6.2, 7.1, and 7.3. Minutes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: SMINWK
variable.description: Minutes of strenuous phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 7.1 and 7.2. Minutes per week of strenuous recreational physical activity.

variable.name: TEXPWK
variable.description: Total energy expended from recreational phys activity (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 6, 6.1, 6.2, 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5, and 7.6. Total MET-hours per week. Expenditure of energy from recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity in kcal/week/kg).

variable.name: WALKEXP
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 6, 6.1, and 6.2. Expenditure of energy from physical activity from walking in kcal/week/kg (MET-hours per week).

variable.name: AVWKEXP
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 6, 6.1 and 6.2. Energy expenditure from average walking (2-3 mph) in MET-hours per week. If question 6.2 (speed of walking) was marked as 'don't know' or was missing, the speed was assumed to be 2-3 mph.

variable.name: FFWKEXP
variable.description: Energy expend from walking fairly fast (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 6, 6.1 and 6.2. Energy expenditure form walking fairly fast (3-4 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: VFWKEXP
variable.description: Energy expend from walking very fast (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 6, 6.1, and 6.2. Energy expenditure from walking very fast (> 4 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: HARDEXP
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 7.1 and 7.2. Energy expenditure from strenuous or very hard exercise (for example, aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swimming laps) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: MODEXP
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 7.3 and 7.4. Energy expenditure from moderate exercise (for example, biking outdoors, using an exercise machine, calisthenics, easy swimming, popular or folk dancing) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: MILDEXP
variable.comment: Computed from Form 143, questions 7.5 and 7.6. Energy expenditure from mild exercise (for example, slow dancing, bowling, golf) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: HLST2YR_3
variable.description: Hormone use last 2 years (estrogen or progesterone)
